title: Watch: Sleepy Skunk's 2024 Movie Trailer Mashup Recap of the Year
description: "Everything comes from you. And everything is you. The one & only not to forget - you are one." It's time! Happy Holidays movie geeks! It's time for a look back at the year in movies. Our good friend the "Sleepy Skunk" has released his annual end-of-the-year recap video - the 2024 Movie Trailer Mashup - editing together footage from every major movie trailer released throughout 2024 to make you smile and laugh and cry and feel good about how amazing movies are. Louis, who makes this mashup every year, puts so much focus into making sure this mashup plays perfectly. I'm happy to see him include clips from little films like Hundreds of Beavers, Widow Clicquot, Memoir of a Snail, Omni Loop, The Brutalist, Didi, and many more. Still no one can ever make a better mashup than Sleepy Skunk - still the greatest. Click play below & enjoy. This 2024 retrospective comes direct from SleepySkunk's YouTube page. For the full list of films (with time-stamps) featured in the video mashup, head right to this Tumblr page. As usual with these year-end video retrospectives, there's probably a few scenes you might not recognize or some you do and want [â€¦]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "Everything comes from you. And everything is you. The one & only not to forget - you are one." It's time! Happy Holidays movie geeks! It's time for a look back at the year in movies. Our good friend the "Sleepy Skunk" has released his annual end-of-the-year recap video - the 2024 Movie Trailer Mashup
text: by December 20, 2024Source: YouTube "Everything comes from you. And everything is you. The one & only not to forget - you are one." It's time! Happy Holidays movie geeks! It's time for a look back at the year in movies. Our good friend the "Sleepy Skunk" has released his annual end-of-the-year recap video - the 2024 Movie Trailer Mashup - editing together footage from every major movie trailer released throughout 2024 to make you smile and laugh and cry and feel good about how amazing movies are. Louis, who makes this mashup every year, puts so much focus into making sure this mashup plays perfectly. I'm happy to see him include clips from little films like Hundreds of Beavers, Widow Clicquot, Memoir of a Snail, Omni Loop, The Brutalist, Didi, and many more. Still no one can ever make a better mashup than Sleepy Skunk - still the greatest. Click play below & enjoy. This 2024 retrospective comes direct from SleepySkunk's YouTube page. For the full list of films (with time-stamps) featured in the video mashup, head right to this Tumblr page. As usual with these year-end video retrospectives, there's probably a few scenes you might not recognize or some you do and want to rewatch, which is why these are so much fun to examine closely every time. For previous SleepySkunk retrospectives, watch more here: 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019, 2018, 2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012. As always, these video recaps make this year look like one of the best years ever in movie history - so many remarkable films. My top end-of-the-year recommendations to catch up with now: Sing Sing, Conclave, Furiosa, A Complete Unknown, Santosh, Black Dog, The Outrun, Nickel Boys, The Last Showgirl, + Nosferatu. Your 2024 faves? Find more posts in: Looking Back, To Watch, Trailer
html:
by
December 20, 2024
Source: YouTube

"Everything comes from you. And everything is you. The one & only not to forget - you are one." It's time! Happy Holidays movie geeks! It's time for a look back at the year in movies. Our good friend the "Sleepy Skunk" has released his annual end-of-the-year recap video - the 2024 Movie Trailer Mashup - editing together footage from every major movie trailer released throughout 2024 to make you smile and laugh and cry and feel good about how amazing movies are. Louis, who makes this mashup every year, puts so much focus into making sure this mashup plays perfectly. I'm happy to see him include clips from little films like Hundreds of Beavers, Widow Clicquot, Memoir of a Snail, Omni Loop, The Brutalist, Didi, and many more. Still no one can ever make a better mashup than Sleepy Skunk - still the greatest. Click play below & enjoy.

This 2024 retrospective comes direct from SleepySkunk's YouTube page. For the full list of films (with time-stamps) featured in the video mashup, head right to this Tumblr page. As usual with these year-end video retrospectives, there's probably a few scenes you might not recognize or some you do and want to rewatch, which is why these are so much fun to examine closely every time. For previous SleepySkunk retrospectives, watch more here: 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019, 2018, 2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012. As always, these video recaps make this year look like one of the best years ever in movie history - so many remarkable films. My top end-of-the-year recommendations to catch up with now: Sing Sing, Conclave, Furiosa, A Complete Unknown, Santosh, Black Dog, The Outrun, Nickel Boys, The Last Showgirl, + Nosferatu. Your 2024 faves?

Find more posts in: Looking Back, To Watch, Trailer
